page.title: 15HOMELIFE IN THE WEDMORE AREA
page.content: Our survey of 150 homes found the average house has 4 people and 10 rooms. The favourite meal is a roast beef Sunday lunch, but continental foods, salads and chips are popular. Most families eat cereal and toast for breakfast and bacon and eggs at weekends. All families own a TV and the majority a feezer and washing machine. A few families own videos, computers and microwave ovens. Duvets are replacing blankets. Most homes have gardens growing mainly flowers, a few vegetables and fruit. Dogs and cats are the most popular pets followed by rabbits, fish, Guinea pigs, birds and horses. Out of the 150 homes in the survey 4 have tennis courts, 3 have swimming pools, 2 have games rooms and 4 have stables.
